title: Formula Bounty
author: Formula Bounty
created_time: July 31, 2022, 03:42:21 PMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 12:08:36 PM by Formula Bounty
content: ============================== Formula Bounty chat ==============================!NO KYC!To participate you need a Polygon WalletBOUNTY POOL = 12 500 000 DUDE:Telegram - 5%Twitter – 25%Instagram - 15%Reddit – 15%Blog – 25%Youtube – 15%===========================================================================GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:* If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.* Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.* If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.* Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.* The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.* The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.* Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.* You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).* Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.* We will update the stakes [weekly].* You are not allowed to ask about the bounty campaign in the main chat of the project.Stakes will be paid depending on posts (at the start of the campaign). 5 posts per week: 1 stake 10 posts per week: 2 stake 15 posts per week: 3 stake 20 posts per week: 4 stake25+ posts per week: 5 stake  Rules:  1. You must join the telegram chat: https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chat2. You should not just write messages, but conduct a dialogue with the participants of the project telegram chat. 3. You are not allowed to write a message about the bounty campaign in the chat 4. You should not have the name of another project in the profile name 5. Participants are prohibited from using any hashtags in the telegram chat!6. Words of greeting "hi, hello, etc." and words of goodbye "bye, goodbye" are not counted 7. Once a week, you must send a report in the form 8. In order to participate you must pass an interview with a bounty manager. Just write to us in telegram (@liisrot31 and @violalewis) Code:Week # : Telegram Profile Link Spreadsheet #: Amount of posts per week:  Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. You must join Telegram chat here : https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chat2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter:  https://twitter.com/MetbackedMoney3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #moneywithoutborders #dude #polygon #pump #btc #pmxx5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project6. All report must be on time or else you will get 07. If you have no new postsfrom our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about PMXX and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per weekRules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the PMXX website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in one of the following subreddit: r/cryptomoonshots.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 4 posts per week. A maximum of 1 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.10. You must join Telegram chat here : https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chatCode:Week # : Reddit Profile Link:Carma:  Spreadsheet #: Links of Reddit posts:1.2.3.4. Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1.   You must join Telegram chat here : https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chat2.   Each Participant should join the official page : http://instagram.com/metalbacked.money3.   Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign4.   At least 5 likes and 5 comments per photo per week Code:Week # :INSTAGRAM ProfileFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]LIKE+COMMENT[/b]1.2.3.4.5.We divide all kinds of content, including articles, blog posts into 3 categories:Excellent : 36 stakesVery good : 24 stakesGood : 12 stakesRules:1. You can use our official images, logos, graphics on our website.2. Articles should contain at least 500 characters.3. The article or description of the video should contain at least 1 link to our website. At least 1 link to your BTT profile should be indicated in the article or description of the video to prove your authorship.4. Only 5 posts from one user are accepted on the blogging platforms, like "Medium", "Steemit", etc.5. Articles must be interesting and aim to build this project.6. You must join Telegram chat here : https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chatBest Video: 72 stakesGood Video: 48 stakesMedium Video: 24 stakesLow Video : 12 stakes Rules:1. You must join Telegram chat here : https://t.me/MBMX_Universe_chat2. Video must be 2 minutes long.3. Videos must include link to the official website in the description.4. Must have your BitcoinTalk username in the description.5. Video mustbe published on a crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 150 subscribers6. Plagiarism or use of other's material will be considered as an invalid submission7. We would accept any positive video about PMXX, not only about the ICO, but about the idea itself, use cases, benefits, ICO etc.8. No more than two videos from one person=========================WEEK 1 (31.07-06.08)=========================
